name: r19.29an
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1)), w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1)), w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1), w2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1)), w2)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1), w2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: A commonly used pattern in the spirit of ~ r19.29 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Dec-2019.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Jun-2023.)
